title: New Year's Eve Parties 2017
abstract: A round up of all the events taking place this New Year's Eve.
author: Rishani
content:
2017 is coming to an end and here we have rounded up the NYE celebrations taking place in and around Colombo to party all night long and herald in the New Year.

Weligama Bay Marriott Resort and Spa

Rs. 20,000 per couple

Seafood themed buffet dinner, champagne at midnight, free flow of spirits, band “OUTLAWS” and DJ music (70's music).

414 600 100



Galadari Hotel, 64, Lotus Road, Colombo 1

Rs. 18,000 nett per person

Dinner with 7 action stations and a Sri Lankan breakfast, gifts, competitions, raffle draw, one J/W Black Label, one vodka, one red wine and chasers per table of 10. Music by Marians and Fire.
